Uses of Item in dungeon.model.items.mobs
 

Subclasses of Item in dungeon.model.items.mobs
 class Creature
          Class representing a creature
Derived classes are Orc and Ogre
 class Hero
          The user-controlled hero mob
 class Mob
          Abstract class to represent any mobile item in the dungeon
Derived classes are Hero and Creature
 class Ogre
          An ogre; stronger and tougher than an orc, but slower
 class Orc
          An orc; relatively easy to kill
 

Uses of Item in dungeon.model.items.treasure
 

Subclasses of Item in dungeon.model.items.treasure
 class Gold
          A pile of coins
 class Key
          A key to a door in the dungeon
Keys can be generic, or can be tied to a specific door
 class Potion
          A potion that affects the drinker in some way
Could be a health potion or an energy potion
 class Treasure
          Class representing an item of treasure in the dungeon
 

Uses of Item in dungeon.model.structure
 

Methods in dungeon.model.structure with parameters of type Item
 boolean Tile.canOccupy(Item item)
          Determines whether the given item can occupy this tile
This could be overridden to represent rooms where certain mobs cannot enter, etc
 boolean Door.canOccupy(Item item)
